scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:modules && npm run build:commonjs
scripts.build:modules: find . -name index.js | grep -v node_modules | sed 's/\/index\.js//' | BABEL_ENV=modules xargs -I% ../../node_modules/.bin/babel %/index.js -o %/index.module.js
scripts.build:commonjs: find . -name index.js | grep -v node_modules | sed 's/\/index\.js//' | BABEL_ENV=commonjs xargs -I% ../../node_modules/.bin/babel %/index.js -o %/index.commonjs.js
